item.title: Phases - advanced
item.description: Previous quickstart presented a benchmark with three phases that all started at the same moment (when the benchmark was started) and had the same duration - different phases represented different workflows (types of user). In this example we will adjust the benchmark to scale the load gradually up. At this point it would be useful to mention the lifecycle of phases; phase is in one of these states: not started: As the name clearly says, the phase is not yet started.
